attributes.action: have democratic views on tv no one point of view, bring back current TV
attributes.additional_details:
we are becoming a a police TV state due to the closure of Press TV and Current TV, we seem to living in a George Orwell site of you can only watch what we want you to watch.
People are not cattle, we have our own minds if we don't want to watch we turn it off , not forced to watch something else

rejection.details: This is a matter for Ofcom.
